author: Odeinoichus
title: Look Out, she's about to BLOW!
review:
Set #41775 Queasy Unikitty: Back in The LEGO Movie this particular variant was a part of MetalBeard's SeaCow if I'm not mistaken, this version has changed the look of the face and possibly altered the parts use, I'm not 100% sure as I did not manage to pick up the SeaCow.

She's definitely sickly looking though with green elements used throughout in various shades, even her horn has changed colour. And of course her tail has alternate striping. It's nice to see this variant easier to come by even if it doesn't quite match up with the previous iteration. A fine release, a nice build and a hearty Recommended by me. Recommended.

author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: My only sitting unikitty
review:
Opening;

Queasy unikitty is a nice variant with an interesting colour scheme and a nice shape for to naturally look like she is sitting .

The Minifigure-

The figure has a light green horn attached to a white hollow stud , a printed 1×3 light green brick and plate with an ill face print and eyebrows , a spring green neck attachment with a line green stamp piece , a 1×2 light green brick slopes a stack of three 1×1 plates to represent her feet and legs  , a 1×1 light green snot brick and a printed tail .

The stand -

The stand is the standard cloud unikitty stand .

In conclusion-

this is a good figure from a good series as the design is a better version than the one from metal beards sea cow so I recommend it to all Lego fans with an interest .
